EnableWS.Name: Enable WebSocket Connection
EnableWS.Hint: Connect to the external API server to receive miniature coordinates.

WSUrl.Name: WebSocket URL
WSUrl.Hint: Address of the API server (e.g., ws://localhost:8080).

ClusterRadius.Name: Clustering Sensitivity (Grid Spaces)
ClusterRadius.Hint: Maximum distance between miniatures to group them into a single cluster.

VisionRange.Name: Vision Range (Feet/Meters)
VisionRange.Hint: The radius of vision granted by each cluster of miniatures.
